om.devservlet.deployment
Class DeploymentRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
  om.devservlet.deployment.DeploymentRequestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, RequestHandler, GracefulFinalization
public class DeploymentRequestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestHandler

Used to handle the actions requested by the Question Developer for the actual deployment of the question(s) to the configured location(s).

Author:
Trevor Hinson

Method Detail

handle

public RequestResponse handle(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res,
                              RequestAssociates associates)
                       throws RequestHandlingException
Caters for the deploy option within the Question Developer. Based on what the Question Developer has actually done we either display the question selection OR actually carry out the deploy of the selected Questions to the configured location.

close

public FinalizedResponse close(java.lang.Object o)
                        throws UtilityException
Description copied from interface: GracefulFinalization
Simple template for the closing of resources within given implementations this method should then be invoked before disposal of the implementor. Where waiting for the finalize method on an implementor is either not sufficient or valid / appropriate. Ensure to invoke the implementation at teh appropriate point also !

Specified by:
close in interface GracefulFinalization
Returns:
Throws:
UtilityException
